alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 9:59AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, eastern Onslow and Carteret Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 958 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Hammocks Beach State Park, or 20 miles southeast of Camp Lejeune Center, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, North Topsail Beach, Newport, Cedar Island, Harkers Island, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Davis, Straits, Atlantic and Sealevel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
